definition: square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter

sentences.english: The main sound box uses the edges and corners distinct rectangle design, the line succinct sprightly .
sentences.chinese: 主音箱採用棱角分明的長方形設計，線條簡潔明快。

sentences.english: Thangkas are usually rectangular in shape, and the square ones are reserved for mandalas.
sentences.chinese: 唐卡通常是長方形的，正方形的被留到壇城使用。

sentences.english: its cover photo is one of a pair of eyes staring through a rectangle cut in black fabric.
sentences.chinese: 封面圖片是蒙在長方形黑色紗巾的一雙眼睛。

sentences.english: The clogs were made in one piece of the trunks of walnut trees which formed a rectangle with its roots.
sentences.chinese: 木底鞋用一整塊根部呈長方形的胡桃樹的樹幹製成。

sentences.english: The main building has a rectangular plan surrounded by a shallow artificial lake.
sentences.chinese: 主體建築的平面是長方形，被淺淺的人造湖環繞。

sentences.english: Put the two triangles together, you can get a rectangle.
sentences.chinese: 把這兩個三角形拼到一起，可以得到一個長方形。

sentences.english: When she was dropped off on an oblong island with no other inhabitants.
sentences.chinese: 她在一個荒無人煙的長方形小島下了飛機。

sentences.english: Well, memory is this rectangle, by default, they're located at the bottom.
sentences.chinese: 好的，內存是這個長方形，默認的，它們位於底端。

sentences.english: Another male skull sported three small rectangular openings in the back of the head.
sentences.chinese: 另一個男性顱骨的後腦部位有長方形的小孔。

sentences.english: The magnification of the slot above with the magnifying power of 150x.
sentences.chinese: 上圖長方形槽的放大圖，放大倍率爲150倍。

sentences.english: The red rectangle is a container truck.
In the simplest case, every Drawable object is a rectangle.
sentences.chinese: 在這個簡單的例子中，每個可畫的對象都是長方形的。

sentences.english: In front of the Empire State Building is a long rectangular wading pool.
sentences.chinese: 帝國大廈前面是一個長方形的淺水池。

sentences.english: The forms make small rectangular soaps or large bricks of soap.
sentences.chinese: 長方形的形式使小香皂或肥皂的大磚。

sentences.english: Cloth diaper may be folded in a triangle or a rectangle.
sentences.chinese: 用布做的尿布可以疊成三角形或長方形。

sentences.english: Make a rectangle with the Rectangle Tool (any color) and Rasterize it.
sentences.chinese: 使用矩形工具畫一個長方形，填充任何顏色都可以。

definition: to inlay/to embed/to set (e.g. a jewel in a ring)/tiling/tesselation
one block/one piece/one (unit of money)/together/in the same place/in company
(of alcohol) to go to one's head/(old) (of a bride-to-be) to bind one's hair into a bun/(of a prostitute) to receive a patron for the first time
above/on top of/on the surface of
